results.name: Smallest prime p such that (p-1)/(2*n) is also a prime.
link: David A. Corneth, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a(n) = {my(p = 2); while (!isp((p-1)/(2*n)), p = nextprime(p+1)); p;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 29 2018
(PARI) a(n) = forprime(p = 2, oo, q = 2 * p * n + 1; if(isprime(q), return(q))) \\ _David A. Corneth_, May 29 2018
